Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Not bad considering how early in the season it is. some grassy spots that you can get around easily. the loop behind Bucks is real nice for skating. not enough snow for tracks though. some areas do have leaves but not terrible. worth going, enjoy!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 4 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails are open. Trails are being packed again this morning and a track will be set on the lower trails and the upper Red for classic skiing. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to opening day at Nub's Nob! Conditions feel like the middle of winter with a little fresh snow overnight mixed into the corduroy. Expect very good snow today. There will be soft snow on the steep runs as it has not been groomed many times yet. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. There is a mini park at the bottom of Dories Bowl. The cross country trails are all open and in amazing condition for the start of the season. Chorizo Corn Chowder is the soup of the day. Welcome back and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
